replies.body: So, you guys have added the function for changing the size of the LCU, but i was wondering if there will be a full screen option because this new client, i think, could look amazing at full screen.

Agreed. A fullscreen option would be really nice, especially since due to the resize option 1080p resize is now possible, making it a default option would be simple. Currently making it 1080p to manually make it full screen resets after client restart :(
yea
yes on this

Myself, idc about full screen.  I do a lot with the client open, but not continuously active, when not playing.  I'd rather click on another app that's visible on the desktop or toolbars, than alt + tab in and out of fullscreen or use Win + D or alt + F4 lol.  Other people do care, though, so it should be a feature, I agree.  I would enjoy Windowed 1080p sometimes.  I like the fact that the actual game is full screen ;)  I would suggest that when using ctl + plus to enlarge the window, that it be centered automatically, if expanded to full desktop resolution, or expanded from the client window corner closest to the corresponding corner of the screen for smaller sizes.  As it stands now, you can't see the whole window when you enlarge it.  The window  position could be either remembered automatically, or at the click of a button in the client.

Tread carefully.  The Windows GUI subsystem is super fragile.  ROFL.  Thanks, Riot...can I call you "Riot" again?  The client definitely needed an overhaul.   I think we can safely put the speculation of another 5v5 PvP map on the back burner for another half decade or so....
Now, if you can just whip those boys in the Chicago backbone exchange into providing reliably moderate (as opposed to moderately reliable) speeds and bandwidth WITHOUT the massive lag spikes and disconnects, this game might have some longer legs on it.  I suppose that's asking you to change American internet infrastructure and design and business ethics, so good luck on that one.   The whole system has degraded to generating money from American consumers by lowering the bar so far that we will beg and pay out the nose for crappy service.  That's also the result of existing monopolies, although there are supposed to be laws in place to prevent monopolies and the resulting increase in costs and drop in value and lack of choice for consumers.  Sure, you were sold on speed and latency wasn't mentioned so you end up with a screaming fast connection, that is when your packets aren't sitting in a congested  internet parking lot off the turnpike, waiting to be allowed back on, and zoom down the road again to the next parking lot.  With so many competing providers (owned by just a few parent companies) throwing their routers into the mix and battling for IT territory so they can charge each other tolls and control market position, latency has become as American as apple pie.
I like the window resizing option. However, for people who prefer the client to be larger, it's still quite tedious to resize the window each time the client is opened.

I may be in the minority, but I actually really like the limited runes.  I was sad when Frosty Fortitude became Frosty Health, but at least I still got to keep the goofy snowman icon.  Now, it's just a big purple + .  When I opened a page with the Frosty Health rune on it, I actually thought it was blank at first.  Any chance of getting the old art back?  If not, maybe a heart icon, instead of a + that could literally be an increase to any stat?
this is a cool update

I'm not sure if someone posted this already but I cannot see my WIN / LOSE  game stats at the end-game scoreboard. For example, I can see that I've won 1095 normal games so far and lost 1090 normal games every time I finish a game and the scoreboard pops up.

I hate the changes to the icons for the role you want to use. If possible keep the original ones please. The new ones are visually as good as I thought they would be in the client. Also, I'd love to be able to resize they client and maybe even a full screen option? Also, Id really like to keep the option of having the client open when in game, its a nice (although not sure if it was meant to stay open) feature.

It would be nice to be able to sort lists of data, like members of your club.  So for example, being able to click the "Member Since" column to sort the entries by most recently joined and then click again to reverse the order.  Standard stuff lol...would just like to see it in the game client and EoG screen as it is a time-tested and reliable way to sort information and doesn't require a separate set of buttons taking up real estate to accomplish the same thing.

Resizing the LCU, is a wonderful choice, however i'm wondering if you could make it so the window resizing can be set at a certain size so that people don't have to constantly resize their window. Also, i believe it would be easier to link the LCU with F12 (full-screen) on a keyboard, to fit the screen of anyones computer, otherwise the Ctrl - and Ctrl + make the screen larger than the actual screen size (that's what i experienced). I appreciate the option to resize LCU Thank you.

Its up for NA guys! I cant speak for the other regions tho!
